message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Isotretinoin is a retinoid medication used to treat severe acne that is unresponsive to other treatments. It can cause birth defects, so oral contraceptives should be used in conjunction to prevent pregnancy. Folic acid, antihypertensives, and vitamin B6 are not indicated for acne treatment.
